00020         CSystemBundleActivator::CSystemBundleActivator()
00021                 : m_context(0)
00022                 , m_systemBundle(0)
00023         { }

00027         void CSystemBundleActivator::FinalConstruct(CSystemBundle* systemBundle)
00028         {
00029                 m_systemBundle = systemBundle;
00030         }

00033 
00034         void CSystemBundleActivator::Start(IBundleContext* context)
00035         {
00036                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00037 
00038                 m_context = context;
00039                 m_context->AddServiceListener(this);
00040 
00041                 // All installed bundles must be started in accordance with each bundle's
00042                 // persistent autostart setting. This means some bundles will not be started,
00043                 // some will be started with eager activation and some will be started with their
00044                 // declared activation policy. If this Framework implements the optional Start Level
00045                 // Service Specification, then the start level of this Framework is moved to the start
00046                 // level specified by the beginning start level framework property, as described in the
00047                 // Start Level Service Specification. If this framework property is not specified, then the
00048                 // start level of this Framework is moved to start level one (1). Any exceptions that occur
00049                 // during bundle starting must be wrapped in a BundleException and then published as a framework
00050                 // event of type FrameworkEvent.ERROR
00051 
00052                 LoadCoreBundles();
00053                 LoadInstalledBundles();
00054         }
00055 
00057 
00058         void CSystemBundleActivator::Stop(IBundleContext* context)
00059         {
00060                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00061 
00062                 // This Framework's state is set to Bundle.STOPPING.
00063                 //
00064                 // All installed bundles must be stopped without changing each bundle's
00065                 // persistent autostart setting. If this Framework implements the optional
00066                 // Start Level Service Specification, then the start level of this Framework
00067                 // is moved to start level zero (0), as described in the Start Level Service Specification.
00068                 // Any exceptions that occur during bundle stopping must be wrapped in a BundleException
00069                 // and then published as a framework event of type FrameworkEvent.ERROR
00070                 //
00071                 // Unregister all services registered by this Framework.
00072                 // Event handling is disabled.
00073                 // This Framework's state is set to Bundle.RESOLVED.
00074                 // All resources held by this Framework are released. This includes threads, bundle class loaders, open files, etc.
00075                 // Notify all threads that are waiting at waitForStop that the stop operation has completed.
00076 
00077                 SaveBundleRegistryState();
00078 
00079                 ReleaseCoreServices();
00080 
00081                 StopAllBundles();
00082         }
00083 
00085 
00086         void CSystemBundleActivator::LoadCoreBundles()
00087         {
00088                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00089 
00090                 com_ptr<IBundle> logBundle = m_systemBundle->getBundleRepository()->CreateNewBundle("Logging.dll");
00091                 logBundle->Start();
00092                 m_logRef = m_context->getServiceReference(uuid_of(ILogService));
00093                 m_systemBundle->m_log = m_context->getService(m_logRef);
00094 
00095                 if(m_systemBundle->m_log)
00096                         m_systemBundle->m_log->Initialize("Execution.log", "Error.log");
00097         }
00098 
00100 
00101         void CSystemBundleActivator::LoadInstalledBundles()
00102         {
00103                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00104 
00105                 BundleRegParser parser("BundleRegistry.xml");
00106         }
00107

00110         void CSystemBundleActivator::SaveBundleRegistryState()
00111         {
00112                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00113         }
00114 
00116 
00117         void CSystemBundleActivator::StopAllBundles()
00118         {
00119                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00120 
00122 
00123                 DynArrayImplOwned<com_ptr<IBundle> > bundles;
00124                 m_context->getBundles(bundles);
00125 
00126                 for(size_t i = 0, size = bundles.size(); i != size; ++i)
00127                         if(bundles[i]->getBundleId() != 0)
00128                                 bundles[i]->Stop();
00129         }
00130 
00132 
00133         void CSystemBundleActivator::ReleaseCoreServices()
00134         {
00135                 VERBOSE("[SysBndleActivator] %s", __FUNCTION__);
00136 
00137                 m_systemBundle->m_log.Release();
00138 
00139                 m_context->ungetService(m_logRef);
00140         }
00141 
00143 
00144         void CSystemBundleActivator::ServiceChanged(const SServiceEvent &evnt)
00145         {
00147                 if(evnt.getType() == eSvcEvntT_Unregistering)
00148                 {
00149                         if(evnt.getServiceReference() == m_logRef)
00150                         {
00151                                 m_systemBundle->m_log.Release();
00152                                 m_context->ungetService(m_logRef);
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155         }
